title: Econ policies in Mex and China

content.question: Mexico has promoted increased competition in the oil industry, while in China, special economic zones (SEZs) along the coast have promoted private ownership locally. Which of the following explains the most likely reason for these policies?

choices.label: Pressure from nongovernmental organizations to improve human rights within those countries
A desire by the dominant party to be able to govern without competition
An inability of the government to control provincial governments
A desire to use global market forces as a means to improve domestic economic output

content.answer: A desire to use global market forces as a means to improve domestic economic output

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.2: Political Responses to Global Market Forces

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with different political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
